attributes.action: Help parents and familys keep children safe on the internet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask the prime minister to help establish a free parent and family education system to inform and help protect our children. Parents need educating on computer filtering tools and best practices on how to protect children at home while using the internet.

Statics such as the average age a child is exposed to inappropriate material while on the internet is shocking. Mr Gordon Brown help protect our children educate the parents.
